headings.usage: Main titles, section headers, impact numbers

body.usage: UI labels, buttons, inputs, general text

structure.main_stage: Split view: Media Library (Left) vs Preview (Right)
structure.timeline: Fixed bottom, horizontal scroll, magnetic snap
structure.sidebar: Collapsible or Floating for export settings

buttons.style: Sharp edges or pill-shaped, no default rounded-md

cards.style: Flat, 1px border, no shadow by default

inputs.style: Minimal, bottom-border only OR deep inset

timeline.item: rounded-md overflow-hidden border border-white/10 hover:border-indigo-500 transition-all
timeline.playhead: w-0.5 bg-indigo-500 h-full absolute z-50 shadow-[0_0_10px_#6366f1]

visual_enhancers.shadows: Ambient light only, no harsh drops

motion.micro_interactions: Scale 0.98 on click, lift -2px on hover

instructions_to_main_agent: Use .jsx extension for all React components.
Implement 'Unbounded' font for headings via Google Fonts.
Implement 'Manrope' font for body via Google Fonts.
Use 'framer-motion' for the timeline drag-and-drop and Ken Burns effects.
Ensure the 'DropZone' is the hero of the initial state - make it massive and textured.
The Preview player must maintain aspect ratio (16:9 or 9:16) strictly.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors with subtle noise.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
